data.name: Etherlium: AI Arise
data.detailed_description:
Get into action-packed matches with different game modes. Use the abilities of your HoverTank and destroy the enemy.

Action and Lots Of Action!


Drop in and play fast-paced, action-packed matches against other players with HoverTanks. Use your tank's abilities to destroy the enemy and take advantage of the agile movement to dodge the enemy's attacks

Story Mode!


Discover the HoverTank Project on the world of Etherlium and prepare for an unforeseen computer attack, causing complete chaos on the planet.

Multiple Game Modes!


Destroy the enemy team, be the best HoverTanks pilot, capture the flag and assault the enemy base are some of the game modes that you will find in this world

data.short_description: Frantic action between hovercraft tanks in a futuristic world with multiple game modes and story!
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
